defi-land-short-description: DeFi Land is a multi-chain agriculture-simulation game created to gamify Decentralized Finance.
portals-short-description: Portals is a browser-based metaverse where you can explore, make, and gather with others a dense city center.
eth-towers-short-description: Ethereum Towers is a community-centric, vertical structure consisting of thousands of player-owned apartments, set in the Ethereum Worlds metaverse.
music-racer-description: Available on Desktop (Steam), XBox One, Playstation 4, and Nintendo Switch.
music-racer-short-description: A musical arcade game, where you race at full speed while dodging obstacles to the rhythm of the music.
stereoload-description: Get more followers, grow your mailing list, and 100% free for creators. Trusted by 40,000+ artists, sign up today!
stereoload-short-description: Grow your fanbase for free using fangate follow for download campaigns!
songlink-/-odesli-description: For artists, for fans, for free.
songlink-/-odesli-short-description: Automated, on demand smart links for songs, albums, podcasts and more.
audius-wordpress-plugin-description: Easily choose between the compact and card embed layouts. Multiple Audius embeds can be added to your posts and pages; simply add a new block!
audius-wordpress-plugin-short-descriptio: WordPress plugin makes it incredibly easy to embed tracks from Audius.co using your favorite track URL.
music-killer-description: Always wanted to shoot mobs while listening to your own favorite music tracks? Now you can.
music-killer-short-description: The very first music adapting first-person shooter is here!
youtube-to-audius-importer-description: Jump-start your Audius migration! Enter a url and the tool will import your video into Audius as an audio track!
youtube-to-audius-importer-short-descrip: Dive into Audius using your existing YouTube videos.
songwhip-description: Increase streams with beautiful landing pages made instantly - no login, no limits, free.
songwhip-short-description: Smart music links that reach every platform.
bass-booster-volume-eq-description: Stream, download from the cloud or listen to radio. Boost the bass and improve the overall sound with a 10-band equalizer.
bass-booster-volume-eq-short-description: The best all-in-one iOS music player app that gives you full control to improve sound quality.
audis-description: Enjoy this free app with no ads or subscription!
audis-short-description: Discover new music, artists, and mixes from all around the planet using the Audius.org free API
